entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
